title: (x) Neomusic - Pastiche {Mike F}
content:
does anyone know the name of this one?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Neomu.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20060511181325/http:/typophile.com/files/Neomu.gif) | 11.13 KB |
author: veli

comments.content: Well, I dont think this is ‘one’ exisiting font, but custom typography, instead..

Well, it certainly didn’t originate from a single source, but the font used was Nick Curtis’ [Pastiche](http://web.archive.org/web/20060511181325/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/curtis/pages/p.htm). The U is cobbled together from the L and even the lovely lady is cropped from the J.

Nice ID / Nice find, Mike..  
_( ‘..Where is my mind..’.? :)_

i love this forum!  
sometimes i visit a german typo-blog.  
it´s so boring and the people are not informed.  
thank you for the link!
